summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code, amending Sections 11.56.020, 11.31.010, and 11.34.020; adding new Section 11.56.365 to prohibit the operation of a motor vehicle by a habitual traffic offender and adding a new Section 11.56.445 to define offense of hit and run by unattended vehicle; and repealing Section 11,56,310 to remove unnecessary language.
